sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-text-field
      v-model="message4"
      label="Title"
      outlined
      clearable
    ></v-text-field>
    <v-textarea solo name="input-7-4" label="Solo textarea"></v-textarea>
    <v-btn @click="postNote" color="primary"> Save </v-btn>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios'

export default {
  name: 'NoteAdd',

  data: function () {
    return {
      title: null,
      body: null
    }
  },

  methods: {
    postNote: function () {
      axios.post('http://localhost:3000/notes', {
        title: this.title,
        body: this.body
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>
